column1: 채용공고 상세페이지 [기업소개] 글로벌 포털 G사 [모집분야] Account Coordinator [업무내용] Operation Support - Market Research - Liaise with other teams for Account Coordination - Operational excellence for client ads implementation
column2: reporting and support - Pull data on campaign and create report in excel or PPT - Monitor campaign status and analysis - Documentation and creating presentation - Communication with internal and external partners to solve problem [자격조건] - Excellent level of English both written and verbal - Interest in digital marketing - Superior analytical stills
column3: with an ability to see both detail and big picture issues - Experience with office tool (xls
column5: initiative and/or group information - Be a team player - You need to be highly organized - Excellent written and oral communication skills - Ability to multi-task
column6: strong organizational skills and work efficiently in a high-paced environment [근무조건] - 채용형태: 파견계약직 6개월 - 급여조건: 면접 후 결정 - 근무시간: 09:00 ~ 18:00 / 주5일 (월 ~ 금) - 복리후생: 4대보험 / 퇴직금 (1년 만근 시) / 연차 / 경조금 / 경조휴가 / 명절선물 / 생일자 상품권 - 근무지: 서울 강남구 2호선 역삼역 인근 [지원방법] - 자유양식의 국/영문 이력서
